title: Deskphone-to-Deskphone Calling & Transfer
description: 12th of February, 2026Users can now transfer IVR calls from one deskphone to another deskphone. Previously, when a call came in through an IVR flow and landed on a deskphone, there was no way to hand it off to another deskphone user.
